name: Blood Bank Management System
tagline: Built using jQuery, HTML5, CSS, PHP and MySQL.
body:
BloodBankManagementSystem_Version_1.1 ===================================== This is a simple blood bank management website which is built using jQuery, HTML5 and CSS. It has the following features: 1.Search in MySQL using PHP commands. 2.Retrieval of results. 3.Insert details in Database using PHP commands. Screenshots =================== ![ScreenShot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akshaynagpal/BloodBankManagementSystem_Version_1.1/master/scr1.png) Home Page

![ScreenShot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akshaynagpal/BloodBankManagementSystem_Version_1.1/master/scr2.png) Search for data

![ScreenShot](https://raw.github.com/akshaynagpal/BloodBankManagementSystem_Version_1.1/master/bb2.png) Insert new data
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
